name: Umineko When They Cry Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku - Limited Edition
summary: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Umineko When They Cry Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku, Witches Acrylic Stand, Potrait Art Collection, Golden Butterfly Pin Badge, One-Winged Eagle Coaster
